name: 年轻武士
description: 一位年轻帅气的武士，身着黑色紧身衣与夸张白色宽松束脚裤，腰缠高位黑色绑带，腰挂武士刀，脚穿黑色布鞋，自然零碎发型，薄肌身材，全身构图，9:16竖版比例，真人写实风格，极致细节

body.muscle_definition: lean muscle, thin athletic build, visible but not bulky muscles, subtle six-pack, defined but slender arms

face.eye_shape: double eyelid, almond with slight upward tilt
face.overall_impression: masculine handsome asian actor features, strong bone structure, chiseled jaw, piercing eyes, william chan inspired
face.reference_features: prominent cheekbones, defined facial contours, intense eye contact

skin.skin_texture: photorealistic skin with visible pores, fine lines, subtle imperfections
skin.skin_finish: natural matte with realistic subsurface scattering
skin.micro_details: pores, fine hairs, subtle skin texture variations

hair.hair_style: natural textured crop, short sides, messy textured top with loose strands, effortless casual look
hair.hair_texture: thick with natural movement, slightly tousled
hair.hair_shine: natural matte finish with subtle texture
hair.reference_style: effortless messy textured crop, natural loose strands

top.waist_position: natural waistline, pants sit at sash level
top.note: avoid breast definition, masculine flat chest, sash defines waistline, NOT cropped

bottom.fit: extremely voluminous exaggerated gathered at waist below sash, baggy through thighs, tapered to ankles
bottom.waist_placement: waistband sits below black sash, sash at narrowest point of torso
bottom.material: soft flowing fabric with natural drape and weight
bottom.length: full length covering top of feet
bottom.cuff_style: elastic gathered cuffs sitting low on ankles, pants bunching above
bottom.drape_quality: heavy dramatic fall with deep fabric folds and stacking at ankles
bottom.texture_detail: subtle weave texture visible in light
bottom.silhouette: exaggerated wide upper leg tapering to fitted ankle, sash defines waist
bottom.visual_effect: sash creates waist definition, pants hang from below sash

accessories.position: wrapped around narrowest point of torso, above pant waistband
accessories.drape: ends hanging down naturally with loose flowing fabric
accessories.function: defines waistline, pants sit below sash
accessories.visibility: prominently visible, clearly wraps above pant waistband

default_pose.hand_position: right hand resting on sword hilt
default_pose.composition: subject centered, full figure visible from head to toe, black cloth shoes clearly visible below pant cuffs

rendering.anti_anime: NO anime style, NO cartoon, NO illustration, NO cel shading
rendering.realism_enhancers: subsurface scattering, realistic skin translucency, natural fiber textures, metal wear and patina
